mapper.insert: insert into account_records (ar_id, sup_id, ar_date, ar_order_id, ar_bus_type, ar_payable, ar_paid, ar_arrears, ar_discount, ar_attn, ar_operator, ar_remark ) values (#{arId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{arOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arBusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arPayable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arArrears,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arAttn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
